articles.title: This Company Is Using Enzymatic DNA Synthesis To Usher In The Next Generation Of Synthetic Biology Innovation - Forbes
articles.description: Ansa Biotechnologies is turning DNA synthesis on its head by using enzymatic synthesis to produce gene-length oligos and finally unlock complex, elegant synthetic biology solutions in human health, agriculture, and so much more.
articles.content:
